name: CinderGogglesItem
description: Whenever the wearer of these goggles casts a spell with the fire descriptor, there is a 10% chance that the spell (or spell slot used to cast it) will not be spent.

name: ColorlessRemainsGoggles_IntermediateItem
description: This is an intermediate step of relic creation.

name: ColorlessRemainsGoggles_MadnessItem
description:
These glasses allow their wearer to use the Maddening Gaze ability three times per day.
Maddening Gaze

name: ColorlessRemainsGoggles_SolidItem
description: These glasses are made of very thick crystal. It's difficult to see through them, thus the wearer suffers a -2 penalty to attack rolls. However, whenever the wearer lands a first hit in a melee against a new enemy, the target must pass a Fortitude saving throw (DC 32) or be stunned and become vulnerable to sonic damage for 3 rounds.

enchant.name: ColorlessRemainsGoggles_SolidEnchantment
effect: Add feature ColorlessRemainsGoggles_SolidFeature

name: CrystallEyeItem
description: These goggles grant their wearer a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against gaze attacks. In addition, they increase the saving throw DC of any gaze attacks the wearer makes by 2. They also grant a +4 bonus on saving throws against hexes.

enchant.name: CrystallEyeEnchantment
effect: Add feature CrystallEyeFeature

name: GogglesOfDreadfulJudgeItem
description: If the wearer of these goggles has the Judgement class feature, they grant 2 additional uses of it per day. They also grant a +5 competence bonus on Persuasion skill checks made to intimidate.

enchant.name: GogglesOfDreadfulJudgeEnchantment
effect: Add feature GogglesOfDreadfulJudgeFeature

name: GogglesOfFeriociousPactItem
description: The wearer gets a -2 penalty to AC, a -5 penalty to Persuasion skill checks and a -2 penalty to Fortitude saving throws, but gets a +4 bonus to damage rolls, a +3 bonus to Will saving throws and a +2 enhancement bonus to Wisdom score.

enchant.name: GogglesOfFeriociousPactEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus -2 to AC (descriptor: UntypedStackable)
Add stat bonus -5 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: UntypedStackable)
Add stat bonus -2 to SaveFortitude (descriptor: UntypedStackable)
Add stat bonus 4 to AdditionalDamage (descriptor: UntypedStackable)
Add stat bonus 3 to SaveWill (descriptor: UntypedStackable)
Add stat bonus 2 to Wisdom (descriptor: Enhancement)

name: GogglesOfMalocchioItem
description: These goggles grant the wearer a +10 competence bonus on Perception checks. Whenever the wearer confirms a critical hit with any bow, the target becomes disoriented 1d4 rounds, suffering a -4 circumstance penalty to initiative checks, attack rolls, Athletic, and Perception checks.

enchant.name: GogglesOfMalocchioEnchantment
effect: Add feature GogglesOfMalocchioFeature
Add stat bonus 10 to SkillPerception (descriptor: Competence)

name: GogglesOfMindControlItem
description: These goggles grant their wearer a +2 inherent bonus to caster level, and increase the save DC by 2 for all mind-affecting spells the wearer casts.

enchant.name: GogglesOfMindControlEnchantment
effect: Add feature GogglesOfMindControlFeature

name: GogglesOfPiercingGazeItem
description: These goggles grant their wearer a +1 insight bonus on attack and damage rolls against outsiders, as well as +10 competence bonus on Persuasion skill checks.

enchant.name: GogglesOfPiercingGazeEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to SkillPersuasion (descriptor: Competence)
Add feature GogglesOfPiercingGazeFeature

name: GogglesOfPureSightItem
description: These goggles allow their wearer to take 20 on their next dispel magic attempt once per day. They also grant a +1 bonus to caster level checks made to overcome spell resistance.

enchant.name: GogglesOfPureSightEnchantment
effect: Add feature GogglesOfPureSightFeature

name: GogglesOfQuickGraspItem
description: These goggles grant their wearer a +15 competence bonus on Persuasion skill checks as well as all Lore and Knowledge skill checks.

enchant.name: GogglesOfQuickGraspEnchantment
effect: Add feature GogglesOfQuickGraspFeature

name: GooglesOfMadScientistItem
description: The wearer of these goggles is under constant confusion effect.

enchant.name: GooglesOfMadScientistEnchantment
effect: AddUnitFactEquipment

name: HawksEyesItem
description: These spectacles grant the wearer a +5 competence bonus on Perception and Trickery skill checks. If the wearer fails a check to disarm a trap, it is automatically rerolled.

enchant.name: HawksEyesEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 5 to SkillPerception (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 5 to SkillThievery (descriptor: Competence)
Add feature HawksEyesFeature

name: MephistophelesGogglesItem
description: Once per combat these goggles allow their wearer to cast hellfire ray, using their character level instead of spell level, as a free action.

name: RascalsGogglesItem
description: These goggles grant their wearer a +10 competence bonus on Perception and Trickery skill checks.

enchant.name: RascalsGogglesEnchantment
effect: Add stat bonus 10 to SkillPerception (descriptor: Competence)
Add stat bonus 10 to SkillThievery (descriptor: Competence)

name: RatcatchersGogglesItem
description: These goggles grant their wearer a +2 bonus on damage rolls against swarms.

enchant.name: RatcatchersGogglesEnchantment
effect: Add feature RatcatchersGogglesFeature
